objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><defs><linearGradient id='bg' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#FF8C42'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#FFDB58'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='sideBg' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#FF8C42'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#FF5733'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bg)'/><rect x='540' y='0' width='540' height='1080' fill='#FFF8E8' opacity='0.9'/><circle cx='170' cy='200' r='60' fill='#FF5733' opacity='0.2'/><circle cx='300' cy='350' r='90' fill='#FFDB58' opacity='0.3'/><circle cx='120' cy='500' r='40' fill='#FF8C42' opacity='0.4'/><circle cx='250' cy='800' r='70' fill='#FF8C42' opacity='0.3'/><circle cx='400' cy='650' r='55' fill='#FF5733' opacity='0.2'/><path d='M800,980 L880,900 L880,980 L800,980' fill='#FF8C42' opacity='0.5'/><path d='M900,100 L980,180 L900,180 L900,100' fill='#FF5733' opacity='0.5'/><path d='M700,300 C750,300, 800,350, 750,400 C700,450, 650,400, 700,300' fill='#FFDB58' opacity='0.3'/></svg>

objects.text:
• Handcrafted citrus-based cocktail
• Fresh-squeezed juices & premium spirits
• Served in reusable mason jar
Limited time offer. While supplies last.

product_details.name: Tropical Paradise Mason Jar Cocktail - Summer Refreshment in Style
product_details.description:
• Handcrafted citrus-based cocktail served in an authentic mason jar
• Premium blend featuring fresh-squeezed fruit juices and premium spirits
• Garnished with zesty lemon wheel for enhanced flavor and presentation
• Eco-friendly reusable glass mason jar packaging
• Includes two colorful drinking straws for sharing or solo enjoyment
• Perfect for summer parties, beach outings, and outdoor entertaining
• Approximately 16 oz serving size
• Decorated with fresh seasonal flowers for an Instagram-worthy presentation
• Carbonated for extra refreshment
• Natural ingredients with no artificial colors or flavors

banner_details:
The banner features a vibrant summer-themed layout designed to promote a refreshing drink offer. The left half has a warm gradient background with abstract orange and yellow circles for added texture. It contains multiple text blocks, including a bold headline (`heading`), an attention-grabbing subheading (`tagline`), a descriptive line for the product (`subheading`), a bulleted description list (`description`), a prominent price element (`price`), and a white disclaimer line (`disclaimer`). A bright red call-to-action button (`cta_background`) hosts the centered CTA text (`cta`). The right half of the banner has a soft cream background (`#FFF8E8`) with decorative geometric shapes and a product image (`product_image`) of a colorful mason jar cocktail.

**Color Palette:**
- Warm Orange: #FF8C42  
- Sunset Yellow: #FFDB58  
- Vibrant Red: #FF5733  
- Cream: #FFF8E8  
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases a vibrant, refreshing drink in a glass jar, highlighting a summer-inspired color palette. The drink transitions from a soft pink (#FBA9B3) at the top to a bold orange (#FE6A1F) at the base, blending smoothly to evoke a tropical and fruity vibe. The glass reflects subtle blue-gray hues (#A6C2D1), creating a cool balance. A bright yellow lemon slice (#FFD93D) adds a zesty pop, while the green (#22C55E) and red (#FA7268) straws enhance the playful and energetic tone. White floral accents (#F2F4F3) with leafy greens (#6BAA44) complete the aesthetic, making these colors perfect for an eye-catching advertisement banner.
